original: kun brtags yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: kun brtags yod pa ma yin te //
translated: The imagined is not existent,

original: btags phyir sbrul dang 'drar mi 'dod //
analyzed: btags phyir sbrul dang 'drar mi 'dod //

original: thag pa'i dngos por ma nges phyir //
analyzed: thag pa'i dngos por ma nges phyir //
translated: Because the nature of the rope is not ascertained.

original: yang na grags pas gnod par 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na grags pas gnod par 'gyur //
translated: Or else, it will be contradicted by common sense.

original: de ni 'khrul min gang gi phyir //
analyzed: de ni 'khrul min gang gi phyir //
translated: It is not an illusion, because

original: du ma'i cha de mthong phyir ro //
analyzed: du ma'i cha de mthong phyir ro //
translated: the many parts are seen.

original: khyod ni dngos la skur 'debs 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod ni dngos la skur 'debs 'gyur //
translated: You will be denigrating real things,

original: rnam pa kun tu yul 'gog phyir //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu yul 'gog phyir //
translated: because you deny the object in every way.

original: de med par yang kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: de med par yang kun nyon mongs //
translated: Even without it, there is still affliction,ğŸ”½because the object of affliction is not the thing itself.

original: ming las don 'jug las 'byung min //
analyzed: ming las don 'jug las 'byung min //
translated: The engagement of the name with the object does not arise from action,

original: smra mi shes pa'i dud 'gro yang //
analyzed: smra mi shes pa'i dud 'gro yang //
translated: because even animals, who do not know language,

original: nyon mongs skye ba mthong phyir ro ;
analyzed: nyon mongs skye ba mthong phyir ro ;
translated: are seen to give rise to afflictions.

original: / gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bos stong //ğŸ”½gzugs zhes brjod la ltos bcas par //
analyzed: / gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bos stong // gzugs zhes brjod la ltos bcas par //
translated: Form is empty of the entity of form.

original: gzugs blo skye bar 'gyur phyir zhes //
analyzed: gzugs blo skye bar 'gyur phyir zhes //
translated: The cognition of form arises in dependence on the expression â€œform.â€

original: brtag pa bzod par mi 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½gzugs ni stong nyid mi rigs te //
analyzed: brtag pa bzod par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs ni stong nyid mi rigs te //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to investigateğŸ”½whether form is empty or not.

original: gzugs min bdag nyid rnam bcas pa'i //ğŸ”½dngos por snang blo spyod yul gyi //
analyzed: gzugs min bdag nyid rnam bcas pa'i // dngos por snang blo spyod yul gyi //
translated: It is not tenable that form is emptiness,ğŸ”½because the entity of form is the domain of experience of the cognitionğŸ”½that perceives the entity of form, which is a thing that has aspects and is not

original: gzugs kyi bdag nyid de yod phyir //
analyzed: gzugs kyi bdag nyid de yod phyir //
translated: form.

original: mngon par brjod bya spyi yin na //
analyzed: mngon par brjod bya spyi yin na //
translated: If the object of expression is a universal,

original: spyi ni ci yang yod min pas //
analyzed: spyi ni ci yang yod min pas //
translated: then since there is no such thing as a universal,

original: des na mngon brjod bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: des na mngon brjod bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Therefore, the self is not the aggregates,ğŸ”½nor is it different from them.

original: stong pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, emptiness is not tenableğŸ”½In terms of the nature of expression.

original: brjod bya spyi ldan dngos po de //
analyzed: brjod bya spyi ldan dngos po de //
translated: Because that thing which possesses the universal of the expressed

original: der snang blo yi rgyu yin phyir //
analyzed: der snang blo yi rgyu yin phyir //
translated: Is the cause of the cognition appearing as that,

original: de ni de @22b bdag nyid yod pas //
analyzed: de ni de @22b bdag nyid yod pas //
translated: And because it exists in the nature of that,

original: brjod med nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: brjod med nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that it is inexpressible.

original: rigs mi mthun pas stong nyid de //ğŸ”½blo mthun 'jug pa'i rgyu yin phyir //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pas stong nyid de // blo mthun 'jug pa'i rgyu yin phyir //
translated: Because that emptiness of dissimilar typesğŸ”½Is the cause of engaging the similar cognition,

original: rigs mthun pa la mthun pas na //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa la mthun pas na //
translated: And because the similar type is similar,

original: spyi zhes bya bar nges pa yin //
analyzed: spyi zhes bya bar nges pa yin //
translated: It is ascertained as the universal.

original: gzhi ma bzung na gzung med de //
analyzed: gzhi ma bzung na gzung med de //
translated: If the basis is not apprehended, it is not apprehended,

original: de bzung gzung du yod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de bzung gzung du yod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is apprehended when that is apprehended.

original: grangs bzhin des na dngos de ni //
analyzed: grangs bzhin des na dngos de ni //
translated: Therefore, that thing, according to the enumeration,

original: brtag bya brjod par 'dod gzhan min //
analyzed: brtag bya brjod par 'dod gzhan min //
translated: Is not something else that is to be expressed or imagined.ğŸ”½Because it is indivisible, it is one; because it lacks substance, it is manifold.

original: dbyer med phyir na gcig pa dang // rdzas med phyir na du mar 'jug / de nyams na yang mi nyams phyir //
analyzed: dbyer med phyir na gcig pa dang // rdzas med phyir na du mar 'jug / de nyams na yang mi nyams phyir //
translated: Because it does not deteriorate when that [universal] deteriorates,

original: gzhan la'ang de 'dod ma yin min //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang de 'dod ma yin min //
translated: It is not that it is not accepted as being in other [things].

original: sngon min autpala ma yin pa //
analyzed: sngon min autpala ma yin pa //
translated: It is not a blue lotus that was not there before,

original: med pa'i dngos pos ma bsal bas ;
analyzed: med pa'i dngos pos ma bsal bas ;
translated: Because it is not excluded by a non-existent thing.

original: / gzhi mthun ldan pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: / gzhi mthun ldan pa nyid yin te //
translated: They are mutually inclusive,

original: gnyi ga don gcig 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga don gcig 'jug phyir ro //
translated: Because both are applied to the same object.

original: gzhan sel gzhan gyi spyi ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan sel gzhan gyi spyi ma yin //
translated: The exclusion of other is not the universal of the other,

original: chos gzhan yin phyir khyad par bzhin //
analyzed: chos gzhan yin phyir khyad par bzhin //
translated: Because it is a different property, like a specific property.

original: lkog shal la sogs blo dbye med //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs blo dbye med //
translated: The cognition of a dewlap and so forth is not differentiated,

original: med la khyad par med phyir ro //
analyzed: med la khyad par med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in the absence of difference.

original: dngos ma bzung bar de 'dzin phyir //
analyzed: dngos ma bzung bar de 'dzin phyir //
translated: Because it is apprehended without apprehending the thing,

original: brtag bya brjod min yin mi 'dod //
analyzed: brtag bya brjod min yin mi 'dod //
translated: We do not assert that the designative base is inexpressible.

original: de yi sgo nas gzhan brjod na //
analyzed: de yi sgo nas gzhan brjod na //
translated: If another is expressed by means of that,

original: de ni brjod bya'i nyid sogs nyams //
analyzed: de ni brjod bya'i nyid sogs nyams //
translated: The universal is not the designative base and so forth.

original: de ni gzhan gyi ngo bo na //
analyzed: de ni gzhan gyi ngo bo na //
translated: If it is the nature of another,

original: des na brjod med nyid mi rigs //
analyzed: des na brjod med nyid mi rigs //
translated: It is not tenable that it is inexpressible.

original: de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa yi //
analyzed: de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa yi //
translated: Therefore,

original: tshul gyis smra ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: tshul gyis smra ba mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that things are inexpressible.

original: dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de //
analyzed: dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de //
translated: Things do not have intrinsic reality,

original: mngon brjod bdag nyid stong phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon brjod bdag nyid stong phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of expression is empty.

original: de nyid kyis de skye med phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyis de skye med phyir //
translated: Because of that, they are not produced,

original: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags nyid //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags nyid //
translated: And therefore are unborn and unceasing.

original: gang phyir mngon brjod ldan dngos ni //
analyzed: gang phyir mngon brjod ldan dngos ni //
translated: Because things that possess expression

original: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar med //
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar med //
translated: Do not exist as they are expressed.
